TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICheckpointManager

Docs.summary:
If you wish to have EventProcessorHost store checkpoints somewhere other than Azure Storage, you can write your own checkpoint manager using this interface.
The Azure Storage managers use the same storage for both lease and checkpoints, so both interfaces are implemented by the same class. You are free to do the same thing if you have a unified store for both types of data.
This interface does not specify initialization methods because we have no way of knowing what information your implementation will require.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> CheckpointStoreExistsAsync() cil managed

Docs.returns: true if it exists, false if not

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Azure.EventHubs.Processor.Checkpoint> CreateCheckpointIfNotExistsAsync(string partitionId) cil managed

Docs.param: Id of partition to create the checkpoint for.
Docs.summary: Create the checkpoint for the given partition if it doesn't exist. Do nothing if it does exist. The offset/sequenceNumber for a freshly-created checkpoint should be set to StartOfStream/0.
Docs.returns: The checkpoint for the given partition, whether newly created or already existing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> CreateCheckpointStoreIfNotExistsAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Create the checkpoint store if it doesn't exist. Do nothing if it does exist.
Docs.returns: true if the checkpoint store already exists or was created OK, false if there was a failure

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task DeleteCheckpointAsync(string partitionId) cil managed

Docs.param: id of partition to delete checkpoint from store
Docs.summary: Delete the stored checkpoint for the given partition. If there is no stored checkpoint for the given partition, that is treated as success.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Azure.EventHubs.Processor.Checkpoint> GetCheckpointAsync(string partitionId) cil managed

Docs.param: Id of partition to get checkpoint info for.
Docs.summary: Get the checkpoint data associated with the given partition. Could return null if no checkpoint has been created for that partition.
Docs.returns: Checkpoint info for the given partition, or null if none has been previously stored.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use UpdateCheckpointAsync(Lease lease, Checkpoint checkpoint) instead", true)

Docs.param: offset/sequeceNumber to update the store with.
Docs.summary: Update the checkpoint in the store with the offset/sequenceNumber in the provided checkpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task UpdateCheckpointAsync(class Microsoft.Azure.EventHubs.Processor.Lease lease, class Microsoft.Azure.EventHubs.Processor.Checkpoint checkpoint) cil managed

Docs.param: Partition information against which to perform a checkpoint.
offset/sequeceNumber to update the store with.
